revised_title: Investigating the Properties and Applications of Spiritus Vini AEthereus
tldr: Dr. Frobenius explores the properties and applications of Spiritus Vini AEthereus, a mysterious ethereal liquid that can dissolve various substances and has potential uses in chemistry, pharmacy, and medicine. The article details numerous experiments and observations, including its ability to extract essential oils, dissolve gold, and interact with fire and water.
